) [virtual]

Marks an Activity to be finished.
It unlinks the Activity from a TodoTodaySheet.
Sets its status as "finished"

void pomotuxdatabase::TodoTodaySheet::MakeConsistent ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
TodoTodaySheet &  rTTS 
) [virtual]

Tries to make consistent the values of orders of the activities scheduled in the TTS.
It fetches the activities scheduled in the TTS, ordered by "mOrder".
The sequence could be fragmented, ie. 1-2-4-7-8-9-15-17.
The method updates the orders to be sequential, ie. 1-2-3-4-5-6-7-8.

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the current database used
rCurrentTTS a reference to the current Todo Today Sheet
See also:
Activity

void pomotuxdatabase::TodoTodaySheet::PostponeActivity ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
Activity &  rCurrentActivity,
TodoTodaySheet &  rTTS 
) [virtual]

Unlinks an Activity from a TodoTodaySheet
It unlinks the Activity from the ActivityInTTS relation.
Does not change its status.

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the current database used
rCurrentActivity a reference to the activity whe want to schedule
rTTS a reference to the current Todo Today Sheet

void pomotuxdatabase::TodoTodaySheet::ScheduleActivity ( const litesql::Database &  rDatabase,
Activity &  rNewActivity,
ActivityInventorySheet &  rAIS,
TodoTodaySheet &  rTTS 
) [virtual]

This method schedules an Activity in the TodoTodaySheet.
It uses the ActivityInTTS relation.
It needs a reference to the actual Activity Inventory Sheet because this method does also a consistency check: the activity MUST be in AIS before going in TTS. It uses ActivityInAIS to perform this operation

Parameters:
rDatabase a reference to the current database used
rCurrentActivity a reference to the activity whe want to schedule
rAIS a reference to the current Activity Inventory Sheet
rTTS a reference to the current Todo Today Sheet
See also:
Activity
